Detailed Description

CmdParameterModified class is the parameter modification command stored in the command stack.

CmdParameterModified represents a modification of the scene element parameter. The modification could be for any element of the scene concentrator parameters. This class saves the new value of the paramenters and old ones to restore the previous state.

See also:
CmdLightPositionModified

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CmdParameterModified::CmdParameterModified ( const QStringList &  oldValueList,
SoBaseKit *  coinNode,
const QString &  coinPart,
QUndoCommand *  parent = 0 
)

CmdParameterModified creates a new command that represents a scene node parameters modification. This object saves the coinNode node parameters previous values oldValueList and the new ones to apply and restore them.

If the coinNode is a container node the modification are for parameters in the coinPart catalog part.

The parent is command object parent.

CmdParameterModified::~CmdParameterModified (  ) 

Destroys the CmdParameterModified object.

Member Function Documentation

void CmdParameterModified::redo (  )  [virtual]

Applies a change to the scene. After redo() the node parameters values will be changed to m_newValueList defined in the constructor.

See also:
undo().

void CmdParameterModified::undo (  )  [virtual]

Reverts to the previous parameters values. After undo() is called, node parameters values will be the same as before redo() was called.

See also:
redo().
